title: Top Stories Friday, Mar. 31: Tesla Recalls Some Semi-Trucks, Ford Slams Brakes On Self-Driving Dreams, TikTok Founder Meets Walmart Chief Privately - Tesla  ( NASDAQ:TSLA )
description: EV giant Tesla Inc TSLA is recalling thirty-five 2023 semi-trucks, citing trouble with the parking brake. The company said in a filing with the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration that the parking brake might not engage as expected when the driver releases the brakes.

title: Oracle  ( NYSE:ORCL )  Rating Lowered to Hold at StockNews.com
description: Oracle ( NYSE:ORCL - Get Rating ) was downgraded by StockNews.com from a "buy" rating to a "hold" rating in a research report issued to clients and investors on Wednesday. Several other equities analysts also recently weighed in on the company.
